title: What font is this? (logo of http://www.ftbauer.com)
content:
I’m curious on what font is used in this logo \> [http://www.ftbauer.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20061116090826/http:/www.ftbauer.com/)

Thnx so much…
author: Marco

comments.content: I’m sure I don’t know, but I like the tail on that f.
It’s Neufville’s [Fontana](http://web.archive.org/web/20061116090826/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/neufville/fontana-nd/?refby=typographica). It’s kind of like the Latin Meta.
